about_the_game:
The prologue of "The Last King" serves as a crucial introductory segment to the game's narrative, offering players a glimpse into the events that transpired just before the main story-line begins. This section of the game provides essential context and sets the stage for the challenges and conflicts the player will face.

In this prologue, players find themselves in the role of a key character, presumably the ruler or a prominent figure within their kingdom. Their surroundings are the very heart of their domain – their kingdom. However, this seemingly tranquil moment is marred by the impending threat of a Persian attack, an event that will have profound implications for the kingdom and its people.

The primary objective during this prologue is to prepare for the imminent Persian assault.

Key Features:

Battle Against Fierce Foes:

Command your army with precision, employing a variety of tactics and formations to outmaneuver and overpower your adversaries.

Recruit, Train, and Equip Your Army:

Recruit skilled soldiers, train them in the art of war, and equip them with powerful weapons and armor.

Build Your Base:

Construct and fortify your own base, shaping it into a bastion of power and safety. Customize your defenses, establish resource production, and strategize to withstand enemy assaults.

Survive and Thrive in an Open World: Explore a sprawling and dynamic open world, ravaged by war. Adapt to the harsh conditions of the wilderness, scavenge for resources, and master the art of survival in an unforgiving open world.

Free Greek Villages: Fight to liberate Greek villages that have fallen under enemy control. Storm enemy camps, destroy their strongholds, and rescue innocent civilians from oppression. Your heroic deeds will inspire hope and rally the people to your cause.

Play Your Way: Choose your preferred playstyle and specialize in a variety of combat roles. Master the art of the spear, wield a mighty sword, or rain death from afar as a skilled archer. Tailor your skills and abilities to suit your personal combat preferences and become a legendary warrior of ancient Greece.

This prologue not only introduces players to the game's mechanics but also imparts a sense of urgency and responsibility. It forces players to make decisions that will affect the course of the game, such as how to allocate resources between strengthening defenses and preparing the army. It also sets the tone for the overarching theme of defense and strategy that will be prevalent throughout "The Last King."

content_descriptors.notes: Players can experience violence, battle, fighting, blood and dismemberment all created to bring immersion and realism in the battle experience.

name: The Last King Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 or above
  • Processor: intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10 or above
  • Processor: intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3080 or equivalent
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: The Last King : a strategy action RPG, customize your character, craft weapons, build base, free prisoners, recruit units in your army, equip & upgrade them to fight against Persian invaders. Fight in real-time battles, commanding and fighting alongside your troops in a strategic war game.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
